channel.title: Semiconductors on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Semiconductors on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Trump says US will take 10% stake in Intel because CEO wants to “keep his job”
item.description: Intel deal could pave the way for the US to profit off CHIPS Act funding.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: US may purchase stake in Intel after Trump attacked CEO
item.description: Trump’s attacks on Intel CEO may stem from beef with Biden.

item.title: Why Trump Flip-Flopped on Nvidia Selling H20 Chips to China
item.description: Nvidia struck a surprising deal after convincing the president that H20 chips aren’t a national security risk. But whether the reversal is good or bad depends on who you ask.

item.title: Why Trump Flip-Flopped on Nvidia Selling H20 Chips to China
item.description: Nvidia struck a surprising deal after convincing the president that H20 chips aren’t a national security risk. But whether the reversal is good or bad depends on who you ask.

item.title: Inside the Biden Administration's Gamble to Freeze China’s AI Future
item.description: What really motivated the US government to ban Nvidia from selling powerful computer chips to China?

item.title: Inside the Biden Administration's Gamble to Freeze China’s AI Future
item.description: What really motivated the US government to ban Nvidia from selling powerful computer chips to China?

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Trump caving on Nvidia H20 export curbs may disrupt his bigger trade war
item.description: China’s frontier AI will be fueled by Nvidia H20 chips, experts warn Trump.

item.title: White House unveils sweeping plan to “win” global AI race through deregulation
item.description: Trump’s “AI Action Plan” reverses regulations, sparks critical pushback.

item.title: Chinese firms rush for Nvidia chips as US prepares to lift ban
item.description: H20 chips, designed to skirt export bans, are back after Trump meets with CEO.
